original_text: So I am asking you to help Onesimus, who is like my own child. I taught him about Jesus while I was in prison. Because of that, he now has life with God. I am like his father.
korean_text: 갇힌 중에서 낳은 아들 오네시모를 위하여 네게 간구하노라

sentences.original_text: So I am asking you to help Onesimus
sentences.korean_translation: 그러니 나는 오네시모를 도와달라고 너에게 부탁하고 있어

sentences.original_text: who is like my own child
he now has life with God
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 이제 하나님과 함께하는 삶을 가졌어
